content: I'm no fan of the Obama Administration, and intend to vote for a non-Trump Republican in 2020. But...even I'll admit, in light of this tweet, that it would be kind of great if Michelle Obama ran in 2020 and crushed Trump.,https://,twitter.com/realDonaldTrum,p/status/981126375716409344, ,…
See...that's the problem.  Picking a side before even knowing who the person is.  Glad to be one who votes for best person,  policies.
If trump runs for re-election he would be the worst person. I would vote for anyone against him.
Economy booming. Jobs abound lowest Black unemployment in 43years. Millions OFF food stamps. Foreign affairs-AWESOME, ISIS almost obliterated. Illegal border crossers stopped; LEGAL entry encouraged.
I know: No fan of Obama. Too conservative for me.  However, Michelle is fabulous.  I predict you might secretly vote for her.
I don’t vote for Marxists.

Interestingly, everyone seems to understand who the looney autocrat is...

The goal is to crush Trump, to allow America to regain its balance. We can then get back to the normal debates over taxes, abortion, size of government.
If it takes Michelle to do that, fine, but Trump and his sick, hateful view of America must be run out of town.
